author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...IONA ALMOST A CATEGORY 4 HURRICANE WELL SOUTH OF HAWAII...
summary: ...IONA ALMOST A CATEGORY 4 HURRICANE WELL SOUTH OF HAWAII... As of 5:00 AM HST Tue Jul 29 the center of Iona was located near 10.8, -154.3 with movement W at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 957 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 125 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...IONA ALMOST A CATEGORY 4 HURRICANE WELL SOUTH OF HAWAII... As of 5:00 AM HST Tue Jul 29 the center of Iona was located near 10.8, -154.3 with movement W at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 957 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 125 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Iona (CP1/CP012025)
